1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: The cartoons "Kustomonsters- Tombstone Birthday" from Craig Clark, and "Prelude to Eden" by Michel Gagne; also featured is the Celldweller "Switchback" music video.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: The cartoon "Astrothrill" by Craig Clark, "Abo and Karo Snakebite" by Hayk Manokyan, Joe Dugan" by Mike Milo, and Mummy DaddyO visits Hot Rod King George Barris at the Culver City Carshow.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: The cartoons "Diggin with DaddyO- Macbeth" from Craig Clark, "It's the Cat" by Mark Kausler, "Puddle Jumper" by Chris Cassady, "Abo and Karo Glassbreaker" by Hayk Manokyan, and the "Ghost Town" music video by Shiny Toy Guns.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The cartoons "Diggin with Daddyo Nipsey Russell" by Craig Clark, "Surfy's Law" by Cliff Parrott, "Sunbeam" by Paul Vester, "Seven Seas" by Matt Siditsky, and Mummy DaddyO stops by Ruby's Drive in Redondo Beach, CA.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: The cartoons "Diggin with DaddyO Halloween" by Craig Clark, "Suburban Sheik" by Craig Clark, and "Conundrum" by Donna Coburn. Also the "Creeping Up" music video by Seventh Ray, and Mummy DaddyO visits a Go Kart track in Carson CA.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: The cartoon "Woodstock Manor" featuring John Byner and Sandra Byner. Also Chris Cassady's "Rice Song" animated short, the Astrothrill "Diamond Dream" music video, and The Faith and the Muse video "Battle Hymn".

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: The cartoon "Diggin with Daddyo-Ali" by Craig Clark. Also Aaron Long's "Fester Goes Fishing" animated short, the Symbol Six "Skull and Bones" music video, and The Nymphs "Alright" music video.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: The cartoon "The Legend of Mummy Daddyo part 1" by Craig Clark, Mike Milo's "Dr. Dumbkoff", Leaving Trains "Sue Wants to Sleep", Monica Richards "Death is the Ultimate Woman". Also Mummy Daddyo visits the George Barris Car Show.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: The cartoon "The Legend of Mummy Daddyo part 2" by Craig Clark, Cliff Parrott's "Canadians for Global Warming", Texas Terri "Me Mad", and Aaron Long's "Fester Makes Friends". Also Mummy Daddyo meets NHRA drag racer Antron Brown.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: The cartoon "The Legend of Mummy Daddyo part 3" by Craig Clark, Aaron Long's "Fester's Nephew" , Chorus of Souls "Seaside Man", comedy with Mummy DaddyO and Butterball. Also slot cars at Big Lou's Toy's and Collectibles in Culver City, CA.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: The cartoons "The Legend of Mummy Daddyo part 4" by Craig Clark, Aaron Long's "Fester's Christmas Fiasco", Craig Clark's "Timbuktu", and Mike Milo's "Captain Obvious".

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: The cartoons "The Legend of Mummy DaddyO part 5" by Craig Clark, "Dr. Dumbkopf" by Mike Milo, Mummy DaddyO's "Wide Wold of Happenings" with Lola Clark, and an animated Chorus of Souls music video, "Whirling Dervishes".

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: The cartoons The Legend of Mummy DaddyO part 6" by Craig Clark, Chorus of Souls "Whirling Dirvishes" music video, Lola and Dani Show with "Food Around the Corner" music video, Mummy DaddyO's "Wide World of Happenings with Lola Clark, and a Diggin with DaddyO "Imhotep" cartoon.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: "Lola and Dani Show" with special guest Mr. Cookie Jar and Lucas, Col. Bleep cartoon "Squeek and the Terrible Termite", Mr. Cookie Jar "Lucas" music video, Mr. Cookie Jar "Lover Not A Fighter" music video, and a Twinkle Time "Kids Rock" music video.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Lola and Dani present the cartoon "Nemesister: Rio Underground" featuring voices by Monica Richards, Col. Bleep "Col. Bleep's Arrival on Earth" cartoon, Dodo; the Kid From Outer Space, "Dodo in Japan" cartoon.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Lola and Dani Show skits, Little Lulu "Bored of Education" cartoon, Col. Bleep "Danger Below" cartoon, Betty Boop "Old Man of the Mountain" cartoon.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Mummy DaddyO's Wide World of Happenings with Lola and Dani, Tootor the Turtle "Moon Goon" cartoon, Gumbasia cartoon by Art Clokey, Diver Dan "Goldie the Goldfish" short film, "Pencil Dance" cartoon by Chris Cassady, and the Kustomonsters Joke Wall.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: The Kustomonsters cartoon "The Go Kart Trolls", Deputy Dawg "The Space Varmint" cartoon, Betty Boop "Snow White" cartoon, Symbol 6 "Spit it Out" music video.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: The Kustomonsters "Rigor Mortis" cartoon, Diggin with DaddyO "Hiawatha" cartoon, Chorus of Souls "Venus in Furs" music video, Diggin with DaddyO "Robert Smalls" cartoon, The Hangmen "Homesick Blues" music video. Diggin with DaddyO "Cahokia" cartoon, The Nymphs "Snowflake" music video.

imdb.plot outline: Episode #1 Hot Rod hipster puppet Mummy DaddyO presents cartoons, music and comedy on The Kustomonsters and Friends show. See the cartoons "Kustomonsters- Tombstone Birthday" from Craig Clark, and "Prelude to Eden" by Michel Gagne. ;Also featured is the Celldweller "Switchback" music video
imdb.title: The Kustomonsters and Friends
plot: Mummy Daddyo is the puppet host of this wacky blend of cartoons, Hot Rods and music videos. He's joined by his skeleton sidekick Butterball who cracks wise at the Endsville Coffeshop.::Craig Clark

Episode #1 Hot Rod hipster puppet Mummy DaddyO presents cartoons, music and comedy on _The Kustomonsters and Friends_ (qv) show. See the cartoons "Kustomonsters- Tombstone Birthday" from Craig Clark, and "Prelude to Eden" by Michel Gagne. ;Also featured is the Celldweller "Switchback" music video::Craig Clark
